content: free borders what can be the most arduous part of making an overlay mosaic crochet blanket the border now available are the fall mosaic border pack patterns - four patterns to spice up those last few row of crochet spook things up with the batty border harvest some pumpkins drink hot coffee or cocoa or tea or simply add a geometric border for a little kick designed to fit any size crochet piece larger than 51st x 51st written in u s terminology be sure to check out the video of a basic border and in-the-round/center-out techniques in case you get stuck
